专门花时间把游戏下载下来就是想骂一骂，想了很多东西，什么逝去的青春啊，什么ow2做的依托答辩啊，什么忒修斯之船啊，但看了看评论区老哥的发言，觉得还是简单一点：
暴雪真的已经不是以前的暴雪了，远离它吧，现在的它只会在背后给你捅刀子，伤害每一个曾经喜欢过它的人。

ㅆ발 개ㅂ신들인가 지들이 pve 만든다고 존나 떠벌리면서 1은 존나 찬밥 취급하면서 유저 다 떠나게 만들었으면서 이제와서 하는 말이 반쪽짜리 pve? 이럴거면 왜 이빨 존나 까고 다님?? 이게 사기가 아니면 뭐냐? 우리가 이딴 소식 들을려고 에코 출시하고 오버워치 섭종 할때까지 1~2년을 쳐 넘게 기다린거냐? 뭐 시즌만 잘 굴러가게 하면 만사 ok인줄 알았나봐 그 1~2년 사이에는 유저들 돈 빨아먹을 궁리만 하셨나 지들이 2 만든다고 IP를 방치하다 못해 거의 생매장을 해뒀는데 2 중 지들이 가장 이빨 존나 까고 다닌 PVE를 사실상 반쪽짜리 출시 한다는 거는 지들이 아예 게임 만들기 싫다는거 아니냐? 이딴 식으로 PVE 반쪽으로 할거면 오버워치 1은 왜 그렇게 방치한거냐? 우리가 대ㄱ리 깨져도 오버워치 할줄 알았나봐 게임 메인 스토리랑 ㅈ도 상관없는 같잖은 PC 주입 할때부터 알아봤어야 했는데 개ㅂ신ㅅ끼들 개ㅆ발 아 마사장님 그립읍니다... 진짜 왜 굳이 이딴 게임을 1000 시간 넘게 하는게 아니었는데

傻逼暴雪 爬

只想跟自己说 有什么好难过的 就算ow还在青春也会结束 只不过是我的青春结束在了ow结束的时候
2019年十月假期 和朋友一起去网吧 当时我只玩单机游戏 不玩任何网游也没玩过fps 朋友拉着我打ow 送给我一个账号
那时的ow已经不是最火爆的情形 但我还是觉得好好玩 即使那一个晚上完全没玩懂只是用dj滑来滑去
后来 当这些朋友都不玩ow了 我还在玩 快要四年的时间 几乎每天晚上都要玩ow 账号也已经练成全皮肤收集的金框账号了
从一开始完全笨比的样子 慢慢的慢慢的 钻研游戏玩法 练枪练垂直飞练睡针 看教学视频学游戏技术 慢慢的变成一个成熟的辅助玩家
组建了自己的车队 认识了直到现在还在联系的网上的好友们 甚至 网恋奔现成功 和男朋友在一起也900+天了 
但就像一切不能永恒的事物一样 
花会枯萎 夕阳会落下 精致的水晶球也会泯灭为尘土
守望先锋消失了

守望先锋归来？根本不是守望先锋谈何归来。
国服没了之后 打了两个月apex 但终究还是没忍住ow瘾 下载了归来来玩 不再天天打竞技 开始打快速更多 也认识了一些可爱的朋友 因为现在的归来就好像我的一个社交软件 比起玩游戏 认识有趣的朋友才是更有意义的
但是归来的游戏平衡 新英雄的设计 亚服排到的路人队友 现在对局的游戏节奏 每时每刻都在提醒着我 这不是守望先锋了
守望先锋已经消失了

我是个很喜欢玩游戏的人 我当然还会偶尔玩玩归来回忆一下青春 就像我也会玩apex 也会玩星露谷物语 也会玩所有我想玩的游戏一样 


但我不会把归来当成守望先锋来玩了
暴雪你就好似那个脑瘫，还有那个包皮烤迪克，没一刀剁下来他婊子亲妈的狗头当球踢再当痰盂用喂野狗纯纯是上辈子当娼奉献了半个地球这辈子让她死的好看点。
不说了，先给个差评

Where do I start?  I wanted that campaign.  That campaign was THE ENTIRE REASON for them to make Overwatch 2, instead of just updating Overwatch Origins Edition.  I'm not gonna go over the, IMO, negative changes to the PvP, I'm going to bash Blizzard for canceling the literal only reason to increase the number from "Origins Edition" to "2."  It's literally the same game with balance changes. (which include forcing squads to drop a member)

The day they announced the campaign was scaled way back, and that they were nickel and dime-ing us on that scaled back campaign, is the day I changed my outlook on the series.  I've been playing OW off and on since year 1.  I haven't started it up in months.  I only downloaded and started it here so I could give it a negative review, because they took the only thing that matters to me, and shoved it in the garbage, after setting it on fire, and running it through a meat grinder.  

Blizzard is kinda done for me now.  They have lost my trust.  I REALLY wanted to play Diablo 4, then they pulled this move.  Salty does not describe my attitude towards them.  I have played most of their games, I was subscribed to WoW for years.  They have lost what used to be a lifelong fan with their recent decisions.  I hope their new corporate overlords actually do step in, and force them to act the way they used to, before all the old guard retired and Kotick spread his evil aura over that side of the company.
回来吧守望先锋

sb暴雪

守望先锋：归西，给暴雪一点3%的小小震撼

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

来点客观评价
暴雪、考迪克死一死的话估计无数人在刷了，总要谈点客观的，不然会有些自觉中立的人说点未经他人苦，却劝他人善的风凉话

先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

结语：
再不刷差评，我可要给三国杀打好评了哦

играю с 2020 года, хотите игру где разрабы будут относиться к вам как к последним терпилам? вам сюда.
Пример даже искать не надо, Overwatch 2 вышла на Steam в 6 сезоне игры, этот сезон посвящен нуль сектору (злые роботы), А СКИНОВ В БП ПО ТЕМЕ СЕЗОНЕ ТРИ НАХУЙ и все скины выглядят как говно в отличии от прошлых сезонов и я считаю что это потому что разрабы знали что игроки и задонят не смотря на вырвиглазные помои потому что они выпустили три сюжетных миссии

傻逼暴雪

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.
Não que a Blizzard não merece o hate, mas o jogo em si é bom.

Oh yes, I was waiting for this piece of garbage to be released on steam so that I could leave my negative review. And so, I don’t really care about the PVE mode, but there were a lot of lies about it, yeah. What really mattered to me was the attitude towards the players (including those who spent any money on it, even before the game became F2P). To begin with, you will get banned for the first time for 24 hours for saying something like "can you hold your shield idiot" to some clown. The second time you will get banned for weeks (or even a month) for contacting another subhuman in your team. They won't ban me here, so KYS, Blizzard. I will be happy to wait for all your other projects on Steam to buy them, leave a negative review and request a refund. That's the biggest you deserve. Oh, I forgot to mention one more thing - you will have to spend a million hours unlocking mediocre cosmetics (and even some heroes), unless you want to donate of course :))
好怀念啊😂以前搜不到消音器的时候就用队友的击扒当消音器😂可惜回不去了好怀念啊以前当阴阳师搜不到手雷的时候就用队友的高玩当手雷😂可惜回不去了这刺激战场真是回忆满满啊，以前玩的一把我记忆深刻，决赛圈剩六个人，对面满编队，就在我们要放弃的时候，我急中生智内设女队友，当场造了两个老兵出来 最后成功吃鸡😂😂😂

I like Overwatch well.....the characters (Waifu Dva) and the lore but the game can get toxic and repetitive real quick. If there was a mixed rating I would def give it a mixed rating but since there is not I will have to give it a negative rating.  The reasons why are they removed the option of the ARTWORK section which JUST SEEMS SO SCUMMY AND CENSORING....[u]GET OVER IT BLIZ WHEN Overwatch 2 was released it was the most searched porn on the hub with in that week[/u]. Also the game def feels like everything good has to be paid for now instead of unlocking them through progression. 

It truly blows what this game has become with all the shady things Bliz has done....and with cancelling the PVE mode and making so many changes that the player base does not agree with who knows what the future holds for this title. AT LEAST GIVE US A ANIMATED MOVIE!

Well at least it is on steam finally and it has achievements attached to it...hopefully they will add trading cards to the mix.

Well the future of this game looks a bit grim especially since Esports is not really doing Overwatch 2 anymore and the Steam user base seems to hate the game soooo press F for Overwatch 2 aka Overwatch 1.5.

考迪克什么时候死？你们不给ow刷差评我就要给三国刷好评了啊

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

有句话说每一个暴黑都曾经是一个暴白，以前我还不懂，现在发现这句话简直太贴切了。
作为一个90后，从小就是玩着PC电子游戏长大的，接触的游戏也不能说少了，但是，16年发售的守望先锋，在我心里始终是独一类的“那个游戏”，它为我和多少个玩家都带来的快乐，看到底下其他测评的描述，仿佛还能带我回去几年前。
可是，暴雪真的懂败坏好感的，每一步都能选择损失最大化的路线，哈哈，只能说幽默。
到现在，收购基本完成，这时候登录Steam，再捞一笔吗。谁都知道暴毙考迪克恶心，确实这个比很恶心，但是这个烂摊子，能归功于考迪克自己吗。
暴雪，看到这俩字就觉得恶心，接着烂下去吧，这算是对你的祝福了。
